name: Stalker
description: 1979 Soviet science fiction art film directed by Andrei Tarkovsky with a screenplay written by Arkady and Boris Strugatsky, loosely based on their 1972 novel Roadside Picnic.

name: Alexander
description: 2004 epic historical drama film based on the life of the ancient Macedonian general and king Alexander the Great.

name: The Crow
description: 1994 American superhero film directed by Alex Proyas, written by David J. Schow and John Shirley.

name: A Better Tomorrow
description: 1986 Hong Kong crime action film directed and co-written by John Woo, and starring Ti Lung, Leslie Cheung and Chow Yun-fat. The film had a profound influence on Hong Kong action cinema, and has been recognised as a landmark film credited with setting the template for the heroic bloodshed genre, with considerable influence on both the Hong Kong film industry and Hollywood.
